sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import HeaderPage from "./header"; import FooterPage from "./footer"; import firebase from '../config'; import SidebarPage from "./sidebar"; class Dashboard extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ date: new Date().toLocaleString(), userCount:'', orsersCount:'', merchantCount:'', productsCount:'', } } componentDidMount(){ let dbCon = firebase .database() .ref("users/"); dbCon.on('value', snapshot => { console.log(snapshot.numChildren()); this.setState({userCount:snapshot.numChildren()}) }); this.ordersView(); this.merchantView(); this.productsView(); } ordersView() { this.setState({loading: true}); var sessionId = sessionStorage.getItem("RoleId"); var userRole = sessionStorage.getItem("userRole"); if(userRole=="Merchant"){ var ref = firebase .database() .ref("orders/").orderByChild("merchantId") .equalTo(sessionId); } else{ var ref = firebase .database() .ref("orders/"); } ref.on('value', snapshot => { console.log(snapshot.numChildren()); this.setState({orsersCount:snapshot.numChildren()}) }); } merchantView(){ let dbCon = firebase.database().ref("admin_users/").orderByChild("Role").equalTo("Merchant"); dbCon.on('value', snapshot => { console.log(snapshot.numChildren()); this.setState({merchantCount:snapshot.numChildren()}) }); } productsView(){ var sessionId = sessionStorage.getItem("RoleId"); var userRole = sessionStorage.getItem("userRole"); var ref; if(userRole=="Merchant"){ var ref = firebase .database() .ref("products/").orderByChild("merchantId") .equalTo(sessionId); } else{ var ref = firebase .database() .ref("products/"); } ref.on('value', snapshot => { console.log(snapshot.numChildren()); this.setState({productsCount:snapshot.numChildren()}) }); } render() { return (

); } } export default Dashboard;
